DOC.brief_title: Oxidative Stress Endothelial Function Pregnancy Complications
DOC.detailed_description: INTRODUCTION . In normal pregnancy vascular remodelling maternal uterine spiral artery occur . Trophoblast cell invade spiral arteriole within first 12 week pregnancy replace muscular wall vessel convert wide bore , low resistance , large capacity vessel , process normally complete 20 week gestation . The pathogenesis generalize endothelial dysfunction complicate pregnancy subdivide two phase . The first phase exist poor trophoblast invasion spiral artery placentation process , cause failure transform placental bed artery high low resistance vessel . This result local ischemia , reperfusion damage oxidative stress . The local damage activate second phase enhance production anti-angiogenic factor oxidative stress product result systemic inflammation , endothelial activation decrease endothelial nitric oxide . In case endothelial damage outspoken , thrombotic micro-angiopathy induced platelet-fibrin thrombus micro-vessels . The angiopathy result consumption circulate platelet , cause hemolysis affect micro-vessels reduces portal blood flow liver , finally result periportal necrosis , condition see severe pre-eclampsia ( PE ) . HYPOTHESIS . - Increased oxidative stress endothelial dysfunction present early pregnancy pregnancy complication develop later . - Oxidative stress endothelial dysfunction entirely independent measure . - Oxidative stress reduce endothelial function improve intervention reduce risk develop pregnancy complication . Thus : measurement integration algorithm oxidative stress endothelial function early pregnancy allow u determine pregnancy benefit preventive intervention . This selection optimize targeted intervention high risk pregnancy without overtreatment others . METHODOLOGY 1 . Study design 1.1 . Single center prospective longitudinal study For first part study , investigator propose prospective longitudinal design . Pregnant woman first trim pregnancy , eligible follow throughout pregnancy 6 month postpartum . 1.2 . Multicenter match case-control study The second part case control study patient pregnancy complicate PIH / PE / preterm birth / IUGR compare normotensive control , match maternal gestational age , parity , smoke behavior , BMI ethnic group . Patients follow throughout ( rest ) pregnancy 6 month postpartum . The patient study include UZA , Erasmus MC , Maastricht UMC , ZOL ( Ziekenhuis Oost-Limburg ) . 2 . Description investigation 2.1 Endothelial function ( RHI ) : The reactive hyperemia index measure use peripheral artery tonometry ( PAT ) ( endoPAT® , Itamar ) . After upper-arm occlusion response reactive hyperemia measure . The contralateral ( dominant ) arm use control , correct systemic effect . 2.2 Arterial stiffness ( PWV , PWA ) : Pulse wave velocity pulse wave analysis calculate use Sphygmocor system ® ( Atcor Medical , West Ryde , Australia ) . To calculate PWV , two pressure waveform must measure know distance apart distance measurement site divide propagation time . Measurements cfPWV perform use pressure tonometer transcutaneously record pressure pulse waveform underlying artery . The tonometer contain micromanometer provide accurate recording pressure within artery . PWA calculate AIx placing tonometer radial artery ( site maximum pulsation ) . A generalized transfer function derive aortic pressure waveform radial artery waveform . PI uterine artery obtain either side cervix 14 week ' gestation apparent crossover external iliac artery 14 week . At moment basic fetal biometry parameter measure : bi-parietal diameter , head circumference , abdominal circumference , femur length expect fetal weight use Hadlocks formula . 2.4 NLR MPV : Performing complete blood count , NLR , MPV platelet count obtain use ADVIA 120 Hematology System ( Siemens healthcare , Germany ) . 2.5 Automated blood pressure measurement : SBP ( systolic blood pressure ) , DBP ( diastolic blood pressure ) MAP ( mean arterial pressure ) 10 minute rest sit position , measure use Mindray VS 900 monitor ( Mindray , China ) . 2.6 Oxidative stress 2.6.1 Electron paramagnetic resonance : NO O2∙- EPR ( electron paramagnetic resonance ) derive magnetic resonance spectroscopy use microwave radiation detect molecule unpaired electron number , like radical . Nitrotyrosine arise ONOO- reacts tyrosine protein quantify placental tissue Western blot use anti-nitrotyrosine antibody . NO formed L-Arginine NOS ( Nitric Oxide Synthase ) . This reaction regulate VEGF ( Vascular endothelial growth factor ) , endothelial mitogen important function proliferation endothelial cell angiogenesis . STATISTICAL ANALYSIS 1 . Sample size calculation 1.1 . Single center prospective longitudinal study For physiologic study RHI pregnancy investigator calculate 95 % confidence interval , population standard deviation 0.5 ( describe population RHI ) tolerable standard error mean ( SEM ) value 0.1 , 97 woman follow . Taking least 10 % dropout account start sample size 110 woman . 1.2 . DOC.criteria: Prospective longitudinal study : Pregnant woman ≥ 18 year old singleton pregnancy Casecontrol study : Pregnant woman ≥ 18 year old singleton pregnancy > 20 week pregnancy . Cases : Preeclampsia , PIH , IUGR , Preterm birth ( cfr group ) Exclusion criterion : gestational diabetes multiple pregnancy fetal abnormality hypercholesterolemia renal disease autoimmune disorder connective tissue disease intake lowdose aspirin vitamin C supplement ( > 500mg/day )
